text:
A notice board put up by the HR&CE department announching the dress code for devotees at the Sri Ekambaranathar temple, in Kancheepuram. - Photo: D.Gopalakrishnan

The Madras High Court Bench in Madurai on Monday stayed an order passed by a single judge of the court on November 26 directing the State government to implement from January 1 a dress code stipulated by him for devotees Page 6
title: HC stays order on dress code for temple entry
